value:
$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Tada! Happy New Year!$k$p$WmMPID_ノート味方,ch00_34_Dagr_FF_Pair,Face|Happy New Year, Princess Reginn.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|What she said! Happy New Year.$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|I'm having so much fun celebrating
the New Year in Askr!$k$pI'm wearing a kimono for the first
time, and, um, Fáfnir is here...$k$p$WmMPID_ノート味方,ch00_34_Dagr_FF_Pair,Face|Speaking of, aren't the two of you
visiting the festival together? Why
isn't he here?$k$pFamily may not always get along, but
it's a new year, and a new world...and
a new chance to start again.$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|I suppose you're right. It's just... He
can be a little scary...$k$pThe truth is, I want him to visit the
shrine with me, but, well... I don't
know if he'd want to join...$k$p$WmMPID_ノート味方,ch00_34_Dagr_FF_Pair,Face|Have you tried just asking him?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Yeah, take a chance! New Year's is an
opportunity for people to have fun.
I'm sure he'll want to join you.$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Do you really think so? Well, I guess
I'll ask him, then... It can't hurt, right?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Oh, Fáfnir? Where are you?$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Hey there! Are you looking for
someone?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Ah, yes. I'm looking for my brother.$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|I'm looking for someone too... Captain
Ranulf. Have you seen him? I'm sure
he's looking for me, but...$k$pI want to find him before Kyza does
so we can go to the shrine together.$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Not a chance, Lyre. Captain Ranulf is
mine! ...To take to the shrine, I mean.$k$p$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|We'll just see about that. Come on!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Huh? Stop! You shouldn't be fighting!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Heh heh... *pant* Give up yet?$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|I...I need a little break... *pant* It's my
obi. Struggling makes it tight…$k$p$Sbs150|
